amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to restrict DHS funding from being used for the construction or expansion of immigration detention facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
